TopicTitle: Kopernicus 1.10.1 BE + OPM Infinite Black Loading Screen(SELF FIXED)

Articles.Content:
I have lots of mods, not an absurd amount, but a lot nonetheless. Here's the mod list. I get stuck on the black loading screen with the orbits on the bottom right. I removed Outer Planets Mod and it works fine, but with it installed the loading is stuck there. The loading planets are still rotating, it's just that I can't see anything beyond the black screen that accompanies it. The music even plays once the main loading is over. I do have Principia and a patch to prevent errors within OPM installed too, but I doubt it's causing any trouble.

Is Outer Planets Mod simply not compatible with 1.10? The log will be uploaded to google drive. It repeats the same error after a while, which is in the spoiler above the log link.

Spoiler

NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
  at Kopernicus.Components.KopernicusStar.LateUpdate () [0x0003e] in <19b75557b052466a841d36b5c4af25e4>:0 
UnityEngine.DebugLogHandler:Internal_LogException(Exception, Object)
UnityEngine.DebugLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
ModuleManager.UnityLogHandle.InterceptLogHandler:LogException(Exception, Object)
UnityEngine.Logger:LogException(Exception, Object)
UnityEngine.Debug:CallOverridenDebugHandler(Exception, Object)
 
(Filename: <19b75557b052466a841d36b5c4af25e4> Line: 0)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1c4ybCpPyNOgcguyOvYDidA_03WOidm1k/view?usp=sharing

How to reproduce. Have the same version of KSP and all the mods I have in a steam installation and open KSP from the .exe file. Wait for things to load. You'll find that either the loading will take forever, or it's an infinite process. 

I isolated OPM to see if it was at fault on it's own. Nope! It loaded. I'll try adding Principia, then the principia patch for OPM. A thing with the principia patch is it has a .cfg for planets that are not in OPM, but in the Minor Planets Expansion. That could be it. KSP did also load with Principia in, but crashed promptly after. I'll install the patch, then open KSP. After that, I'll patch the patch and open it again. For the unedited patch, it loaded in and crashed again. For the edited patch it loaded in and crashed as well. It probably has something to do with me doing other things in the meantime on my pc. Now to boot the original install. the infinite loading persists. Any help?

Edited November 13, 2020 by accidentalcolonies

Fixed it myself!

I just installed OPM incorrectly.
So how do we need to install OPM correctly?
